snippet: The raid was carried out to check residency permits and eliminate networks of religious extremists, officials said.
abstract: Russian police and security officials in St Petersburg detain 271 people, mostly migrants,  during raid on Muslim prayer rooms at central market; officials say raid is to check residency permits and to eliminate networks of religious extremists planning terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The raid was carried out to check residency permits and eliminate networks of religious extremists, officials said.

headline.seo: Russia Detains 271 in St. Petersburg Security Raid
headline.main: Russia Detains 271 People During Security Raid in St. Petersburg
headline.print_headline: Russia Detains 271 People During Security Raid in St. Petersburg
